interfaces.name: DataResponsePokemon
Pokemon
Specy
Stat

injectables.name: PokemonService

components.name: AppComponent
BackComponent
ButtonComponent
EvolutionsComponent
components.templateData: {{pokemon.name}}

components.name: MainSearchComponent
components.templateData: Pokemon Name or Id

components.name: PokemonDetailsComponent
components.templateData:
{{selectedPokemon?.name| titlecase}}
{{ type.pokemon_v2_type.name | uppercase }}
{{selectedPokemon?.pokemon_v2_pokemonspecy?.pokemon_v2_pokemonspeciesflavortexts![0].flavor_text}}
Stats
Evolutions
MOVES

components.name: PokemonNotFoundComponent
components.templateData: No Pokemon Found!

components.name: StatsComponent
components.templateData:
{{stats[stat.pokemon_v2_stat.name]}}
{{stat.effort|number : '3.0'}}

modules.name: AppModule
AppRoutingModule
GraphQLModule

variables.name: GET_ALL_POKEMONS
GET_POKEMON_BY_ID
GET_POKEMON_BY_NAME
preview
Stats

{
	hp : "HP",
	attack : "ATK",
	defense : "DEF",
    "special-attack":"SATK",
	"special-defense" : "SDEF",
	speed : "SPD",
	
} as const
